title: Women Astronomers: Reaching for the Stars
description: Women Reaching for the StarsÂ  (by Mabel Armstrong is the first in a planned series of "Women in Science" books for Young Adults. Women Astronomers covers some of the fascinating women who dared to look toward the stars from the first known woman astronomer Hypatia of Alexandria to Astronaut Sally Ride and all the fascinating, brave women in between.
author: Mabel Armstrong
